prompts: Create a gray-toned Pokemon with a serpentine body and metallic features.
Show me a massive, rock-covered creature that resembles a living serpent.
Generate a powerful Pokemon that can dig through mountains and caves effortlessly.
Imagine a Pokemon with long, sharp spikes along its back and a fierce gaze.
Design a dual-type Steel and Ground Pokemon with a strong, intimidating presence.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains and is known for its strength.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek, metallic body and a tail resembling a drill.
